text: Nebarebekhwo amakhuwa kolukongo lwali ahambi nende inyanza. Olwa bafunakanga lilako lia Jumamosi. Olwe tsinyeni tsiabu tsiabetselanga hekulu hekulu- tsinyanga tsia Jumamosi tsiabu, ne tsinyanga tsilali tsia jimamosi shitsiabetselanga tawe. Ne endio nilwakhwabahelesia amatemo khulwa okhukhaya khwabu
